description:
Sweetalerts2 is a library that allows you to create beautiful, responsive, and customizable alert messages on your website or app.

We currently support the use of 

• Sweet Alerts
• Toast Alert

Built with ❤️ by New Horizon Code.

Prefer one-on-one assistance? Check out our friends at Copilot! Book half-an-hour with them at https://withcopilot.com/sessions
name: Sweet Alerts
